body.name: Glycolic Acid Toner for Face - Age Defying, Pore Minimizer for Face, Exfoliating Toner - with Aloe Vera, Cucumber, Hyaluronic Acid - AHA Toner - Alcohol Free Toner-for All Skin Types-by Vital Affair.

features: Age Defying, Skin Firming & Pore Refining Toner- The consistent use of our face toner, formulated at a concentration of 7% and a pH of 3.6, will help rejuvenate your skin, minimize the appearance of fine lines, wrinkles and enlarged pores.

Helps Brighten & Even Out Skin Tone - Our facial toner for aging skin is a gentle exfoliant, working by exfoliating the uppermost layer of skin breaking down the dead skin buildup that clogs the pores while revealing the original, clear and glowing skin. It also works as a skin prep for any further treatment or use of serums. Not only this, you will love how it will remove any residual makeup.

A Facial Toner Combined With The Benefits Of Aloe Vera, Cucumber, Hyaluronic Acid, Rosemary Oil, Clover Flower Extract & Green Tea Extract - While this powerhouse AHA gives a fresh start to a dull skin, the botanical extracts in our face toner for women help repair dry skin, tighten pores, fight blemishes & sop up oil.

Suitable For All Skin Types - Our Alcohol Free Toner with its pH value of 3.6 makes it work best on all skin types without dryness or irritation while controlling oil. Suitable for oily skin, normal, dry or combination. Love it! Pass on the gift of beautiful skin to your loved ones!

Satisfaction Guarantee - Our product is proudly Made In The USA. It is formulated with Vegan Ingredients without any parabens or unsafe ingredients, in a GMP certified manufacturing facility. Our product is Cruelty Free and not tested on animals. While it is gentle and suitable for all skin types, we do understand that every skin is unique. If for any reason, you are not satisfied, feel free to contact us and we will be happy to make it right for you.
body.description: HOW GLYCOLIC ALPHA HYDROXY ACID HELPS: Cellular Turnover is described as how quickly new cells migrate from the deepest layers to the top layers of skin. As we age, the process of Cellular Turnover slows down resulting in dead cells to accumulate and stay longer on the top layers causing sagging, more lines, wrinkles, dull skin, enlarged pores because of clogging, trapped bacteria causing blemishes and breakouts. Glycolic Acid Has The Smallest Molecular Size of all the AHAs which allows it to penetrate skin most easily and readily. Bringing our Glycolic Acid Toner in daily skincare routine, can address the issues of dull skin, enlarged & clogged pores, blemishes & fine lines by removing the dead cells and bringing out fresh skin Our Glycolic Acid 7% Toner, face toner for women anti aging, with its excellent penetrating, preps skin for better absorption of serums or other anti acne & pore reducer treatments and moisturizers. Made in the USA Paraben Free Perfume Free Alcohol Free Formulated with Vegan Ingredients Cruelty Free

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BENEFITS OF OUR GYCOLIC ACID FACE TONER FOR WOMEN & MEN EXFOLIATING TONER Our exfoliating toner works gently to slough away the dead cell build up, bringing out smoother and brighter skin. PORE MINIMIZER FACIAL TONER Our glycolic acid face toner for women with its penetrating quality goes into skin to clear clogged pores. Its consistent use will help in controlling excess oil resulting in visibly reduced pore size while controlling breakouts. HYDRATING TONER Our glycolic acid toner for face is not any ordinary glycolic acid toner! We have combined the Alpha Hydroxy Acid with Aloe Vera and Hyaluronic Acid to keep skin hydrated while exfoliating it gently.

POWERHOUSE INGREDIENTS IN OUR FACIAL TONER FOR AGING SKIN With the numerous benefits of Alpha Hydroxy Glycolic Acid, our facial toner with Glycolic Acid also contains the proven benefits of Aloe Vera, Cucumber and Hyaluronic Acid and other botanical extracts. Aloe Vera: With its antioxidant properties, Aloe Vera is known for reducing signs of aging, treating acne, lightening scars and blemishes.Cucumber: Tightens open pores, rejuvenates and hydrates dull skin.Hyaluronic Acid: Keeps skin hydrated and locks hydration. Rosemary Leaf Oil: While working as an antioxidant, it fights blemishes. Clover Flower Extract: Visibly reduces pores and wrinkles. Green Tea Extract: An oxidant which calms the skin while keeping redness in check. Our toner works gently on skin but we are also aware that every skin is unique and so we recommend patch testing prior to use.

Our Glycolic Acid 7% Toner Gently Exfoliates Skin OUR TONER FOR FACE ADDRESSES THE FOLLOWING CONCERNS: How to get smooth skin?How to shrink pores?How to achieve brighter skin? Our Glycolic Acid 7% Toning Solution, a facial exfoliator for women will help you achieve your goals. For All Skin Types Toner for Normal Skin Toner for Combination Skin Toner for Oily Skin Toner for Dry Skin Toner for Acne Prone Skin HOW GLYCOLIC ALPHA HYDROXY ACID HELPS: Cellular Turnover is described as how quickly new cells migrate from the deepest layers to the top layers of skin. As we age, the process of Cellular Turnover slows down resulting in dead cells to accumulate and stay longer on the top layers causing sagging, more lines, wrinkles, dull skin, enlarged pores because of clogging, trapped bacteria causing blemishes and breakouts. Glycolic Acid Has The Smallest Molecular Size of all the AHAs which allows it to penetrate skin most easily and readily. Bringing our Glycolic Acid Toner in daily skincare routine, can address the issues of dull skin, enlarged & clogged pores, blemishes & fine lines by removing the dead cells and bringing out fresh skin Our Glycolic Acid 7% Toner, face toner for women anti aging, with its excellent penetrating, preps skin for better absorption of serums or other anti acne & pore reducer treatments and moisturizers. Made in the USA Paraben Free Perfume Free Alcohol Free Formulated with Vegan Ingredients Cruelty Free

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First Step To Glass Skin
reviews.reviewText: I love just about everything about this toner. It's become a staple in my skincare routine. The addition of cucumber, aloe vera, and hyaluronic acid nicely seem to cancel out the harsh qualities of the glycolic acid. It leaves my skin feeling firmer and cleaner practically immediately and I noticed a slight shrinkage in my pores' visibility. I'm not a huge fan of the chemical smell it has but, hey, it IS a bunch of chemicals. I would do a small patch test on those with sensitive skin as this is a rough though highly effective low grade chemical peel essentially. Love this product and would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good glycolic acid toner
reviews.reviewText: I usually use the ordinary but I think this toner is just as good. I also use this a deodorant which works well. I rub it directly onto my under arms with no cotton ball and I stay fresh all day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Doesn't have much of a glycolic "sting" and I was disappointed. I like the ingredients though and kept using it in my nighttime skin care. No 7 is a good product nevertheless and did make my skin plumper and smooth. My initial disappointment turned into satisfaction, and I like the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle enough for daily use
reviews.reviewText: When I started using this stuff, I was only using it once a week, (thanks, beauty YouTubers) worried that it would dry me out or irritate me. After a couple of months, I felt like it wasn't making any difference to my skin. However, I tested using it every other night and had no issues, no irritation or redness and my skin felt smoother. Now I use it every single night before my Tretinoin and I've never had irritation. My skin looks smoother, feels softer, and has that "glass skin" shine. I would say, try it one night and gauge your skins reaction. If you don't see or feel any irritation, try it every other night. If irritation occurs, you can always back off to once a week again. This stuff has other calming, soothing ingredients and the percentage of glycolic acid is low enough that unless you have super super sensitive skin or open wounds, I think you'll be fine using it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not the best
reviews.reviewText: This product gave me more glory skin SOMETIMES. I noticed that I cannot use this product daily because it will leave my skin extremely dry. Using 2 times a week works, but I would prefer a product that is less harsh on the skin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Suavidad e hidratación garantizados!
reviews.reviewText: Me encanta su textura. Deja el rostro muy hidratado sin ser pegajoso. Se siente la diferencia desde el primer uso. Lo recomiendo!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it! I see and feel the difference!
reviews.reviewText: Always receive compliments on my facial skin. I have a routine and so glad I changed this particular brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Glycolic Toner!
reviews.reviewText: First time using it and it does what glycolic acid toner us supposed to do without overly drying your skin. I like this stuff a lot! Will buy again!
